      • move

        public boolean move(Map map,
                    Field newField)
             throws HasAlreadyMovedException,
                    CannotMineException,
                    StorageFullException
        Move a Transporter to the new Field if possible
        Specified by:
        move in class AbstractMeeple
        Parameters:
        map - The @Map
        newField - the new Field where the meeple should move
        Returns:
        True if the Transporter has moved successful
        Throws:
        HasAlreadyMovedException - If the meeple has already moved this round, it cannot move again
        CannotMineException - The meeple (@Transporter) cannot mine here
        StorageFullException - The meeple (@Transporter) cannot mine more energy, because the storage is full

      • attack

        public void attack(Field pos)
            throws CannotMoveException
        Transporter cannot Attack other meeple they always throw CannotMoveException
        Specified by:
        attack in class AbstractMeeple
        Parameters:
        pos - Field where the other meeple stands on
        Throws:
        CannotMoveException - The meeple cannot move to this point, but can move to another this round
